Interface LineProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLineProcessor

    public interface LineProcessor
    Interface to be implemented by classes wanting to process a file and extract some metrics/stats. The metrics are supposed to be named and a Key (name) - value map is created to store them. Before you write your own LineProcessor, you may want to revisit some basics of text encoding and unicode in Java:
    See Also:
    http://illegalargumentexception.blogspot.co.uk/2009/05/java-rough-guide-to-character-encoding.html

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getKeyNames()
      Returns a list of "tags" (keys in a Map) that can be used by the developer of a class implementing this interface to give a name to whatever stats/values the Processor is calculating.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getKVForProcessedLines()
      Return a map where the key is the stat name and the value is the actual value of the calculated stat over the processed lines.
      java.lang.String printProcessedLines()
      Pretty prints the desired statistics
      void process(java.lang.String line)
      Calculates statistics from the provided line and accumulates results in internal data structures.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        void process(java.lang.String line)
        Calculates statistics from the provided line and accumulates results in internal data structures. This operation is not idempotent for it will accummulate
        Parameters:
        line - to be processed as read from the file

      • printProcessedLines

        java.lang.String printProcessedLines()
        Pretty prints the desired statistics
        Returns:
        String representing the stats calculated from all lines in a File.

      • getKeyNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getKeyNames()
        Returns a list of "tags" (keys in a Map) that can be used by the developer of a class implementing this interface to give a name to whatever stats/values the Processor is calculating.
        Returns:
        keys of the metrics calculated by this line processor

      • getKVForProcessedLines

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getKVForProcessedLines()
        Return a map where the key is the stat name and the value is the actual value of the calculated stat over the processed lines.
        Returns:
        Name-value KV map of all the stats
